page.title: 03Farming-Dorking NE
page.content: In our area there are 6 farms.We visited 2 of them.The first 'Chapel Farm'was of 200 acres-all grassland for feeding cows and a few sheep.They also have{educational farm visits}from schools and clubs.{Milk production}has had to be cut this year because the Common Market does not want as much. The second farm'Boxhill Farm'is about the same size and all{grassland. Some is used for hay to feed the beef cattle and sheep.It is a family farm and it also has pigs,a few ducks, chickens and a goat.Another member of the family,Jack,runs a{car mechanics business in an old barn.People who camp on the farm include:-Camping Clubs,Cubs,Scouts Cadets and{deprived {children}from London who are sent by the Church Council and would otherwise not have a holiday.
